verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4427>reigns;<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice;<s%> Let the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H339>islands<s%> be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>

<S%H6051>Clouds<s%> and <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>darkness<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> Him; <S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> are the <S%H4349>foundation<s%> of His <S%H3678>throne.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%> like <S%H1749>wax<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> At the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> His <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> His <S%H9202>glory.<s%>

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> those be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> who <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>images,<s%> Who <S%H1984>boast<s%> themselves of <S%H457>idols;<s%> <S%H7812>Worship<s%> Him, <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [this] and was <S%H8055>glad,<s%> And the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> <S%H4616>Because<s%> of Thy <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

For Thou art the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5945>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> Thou art <S%H5927>exalted<s%> <S%H3966>far<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H8130>Hate<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> you who <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of His <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones;<s%> He <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H216>Light<s%> is <S%H2232>sown<s%> [like seed] for the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> And <S%H8057>gladness<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>ones;<s%> And <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2143>name.<s%>
